Flow.label: Sendblue Bulk Demo Simple

fields.name: IntroductionText
fields.fieldText:
Sendblue Bulk Message Sending Demo


This flow demonstrates the proper way to avoid "You have uncommitted work pending" errors when sending multiple messages.


✓ CORRECT Approach (Bulkification):

  • Collect all message data first
  • Pass entire collection to SendMessage action ONCE
  • The action handles all messages in a single transaction
  • No callout/DML conflicts occur


✗ INCORRECT Approach (Looping):

  • Loop element iterates over records
  • SendMessage action called inside the loop
  • First iteration: callout + uncommitted DML
  • Second iteration: ERROR - uncommitted work pending


Key Point: The SendMessage invocable method accepts a List of inputs and processes them all together. Use this capability!


Note: This is a demonstration flow. In production, you would query records and build the collection dynamically.
